salesforce products

Niche Solutions To Fill The Gap

Sales Cloud

Salesforce Sales Cloud is a customer relationship management (CRM) platform designed to support sales, marketing and customer support

Service Cloud

Salesforce Service Cloud is a customer relationship management (CRM) platform for customer service and support

Pardot

Pardot is a software as a service marketing automation platform by SalesForce offering email automation, targeted email campaigns and lead management for B2B sales and marketing organizations.

Revenue Cloud (CPQ)

Speed up your growth with Salesforce Revenue Cloud. Bring CPQ software and Billing together for one powerful revenue management tool.

Experience Cloud

Built on the Salesforce platform, Experience Cloud is a digital platform that helps companies build connected CRM-powered digital experiences

Commerce Cloud

Commerce Cloud is a key part of the Salesforce Customer Success Platform and offers ecommerce solutions for B2C (business to consumer) and B2B (business to business) customers

Platform

Salesforce Platform is a unified service that provides developers with the ability to build and deploy cloud-based apps

Integration

Salesforce integration is the process of merging the data and functionality of Salesforce with another application to provide users with a single unified experience

Field Service Lightning

Salesforce Field Service Lightning delivers faster, smarter, more personalised service from the phone to the field – all on one platform.

Ideation to reality

Process we follow

Imagine, your business is understaffed to cater to your clients or your business is overstaffed to cater to your existing requirements. Do you think you would able to grow business and revenue in an efficient way in any of the above scenario? The answer is no. You would need apt amount of man power who are expert in your business domain to deliver optimum level of results.

Right solution in precise custom way that suits your business needs is our motto at Techabled Consulting!
